ai-tika-s0402t55:1_1: The third method of explanation apprehending the first, etc.
ai-tika-s0402t55:1_2: After reflecting on the skill in connection with the skill in the Queen’s time and then the perils of the Kapilavatthu should be understood as it is said in the Simile of the perils of sense desires.
ai-tika-s0402t55:1_3: After hearing it from there, he should apprehendel whatever is well talked, etc., and through hearing it by hearing it as possible, etc., and only the meaning here and now make any other kasiṇa material gain for himself. What can be understood as such.
